languages.text: "Он говорил, что блюстителей заставляют угнетать таких же членов экипажа, как они сами, в интересах зажравшегося старшего офицерства. Призывал к смене порядков, расправам и покаянию за участие в преступлениях прогнившей иерархии корабля". {n}Кляйн мрачно сплевывает, оттянув респиратор.{/n}

"He claimed that the enforcers were being pressured into oppressing their fellow crewmen for the benefit of their greedy superiors. He called for a change of order, including reprisals and penance for anyone who had participated in the crimes of the ship's rotten hierarchy." {n}Klein pulls his respirator aside and spits morosely.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Он говорил, что блюстителей заставляют угнетать таких же членов экипажа, как они сами, в интересах зажравшегося старшего офицерства. Призывал к смене порядков, расправам и покаянию за участие в преступлениях прогнившей иерархии корабля". {n}Кляйн мрачно сплевывает, оттянув респиратор.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "He said the enforcers were being pressured to oppress crewmen like themselves for the benefit of the greedy senior officers. He called for a change of order, reprisals and repentance for participating in the crimes of the ship's rotten hierarchy." {n}Klein pulls back his respirator and spits morosely.{/n}

He called for a change of order, including reprisals and penance for anyone who had participated in the crimes of the ship's rotten hierarchy." {n}Klein pulls his respirator aside and spits morosely.{/n}

"He claimed that the enforcers were being pressured into oppressing their fellow crewmen for the benefit of their greedy superiors. He called for a change of order, including reprisals and penance for anyone who had participated in the crimes of the ship's rotten hierarchy." {n}Klein pulls his respirator aside and spits morosely.{/n}

languages.text: «Dijo que presionaban al personal de seguridad para oprimir a los demás miembros de la tripulación en beneficio de sus superiores codiciosos. Llamó a un cambio de orden, incluyendo castigos y penitencia para todos los que hubieran participado en los crímenes de la jerarquía corrupta de la nave». {n}Klein se quita el respirador de la boca para escupir con desprecio.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He claimed that the enforcers were being pressured into oppressing their fellow crewmen for the benefit of their greedy superiors. He called for a change of order, including reprisals and penance for anyone who had participated in the crimes of the ship's rotten hierarchy." {n}Klein pulls his respirator aside and spits morosely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Dijo que presionaban al personal de seguridad para oprimir a los demás miembros de la tripulación en beneficio de sus superiores codiciosos. Llamó a un cambio de orden, incluyendo castigos y penitencia para todos los que hubieran participado en los crímenes de la jerarquía corrupta de la nave». {n}Klein se quita el respirador de la boca para escupir con desprecio.{/n}

languages.text: 「彼は、強欲な上官の利益のために、エンフォーサーが圧力をかけられて、仲間のクルーを抑圧していると言い張りました。彼は、この船の腐ったヒエラルキーの罪に加担した者への報復と懺悔も加えて、秩序を変えるよう求めたのです」{n}クラインは呼吸器を端に寄せて、不機嫌そうに吐き捨てる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "He claimed that the enforcers were being pressured into oppressing their fellow crewmen for the benefit of their greedy superiors. He called for a change of order, including reprisals and penance for anyone who had participated in the crimes of the ship's rotten hierarchy." {n}Klein pulls his respirator aside and spits morosely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「彼は、強欲な上官の利益のために、エンフォーサーが圧力をかけられて、仲間のクルーを抑圧していると言い張りました。彼は、この船の腐ったヒエラルキーの罪に加担した者への報復と懺悔も加えて、秩序を変えるよう求めたのです」{n}クラインは呼吸器を端に寄せて、不機嫌そうに吐き捨てる。{/n}

languages.text: “他声称执法者迫于上面的压力，为了那些贪婪的高阶军官，不得不压迫他们的同伴。他呼吁改变现有制度，要对所有腐朽的上层人士进行报复，让他们忏悔。”{n}克莱因把呼吸器拉起来，郁郁地吐了口唾沫。{/n}
languages.original_text: "He claimed that the enforcers were being pressured into oppressing their fellow crewmen for the benefit of their greedy superiors. He called for a change of order, including reprisals and penance for anyone who had participated in the crimes of the ship's rotten hierarchy." {n}Klein pulls his respirator aside and spits morosely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他声称执法者迫于上面的压力，为了那些贪婪的高阶军官，不得不压迫他们的同伴。他呼吁改变现有制度，要对所有腐朽的上层人士进行报复，让他们忏悔。”{n}克莱因把呼吸器拉起来，郁郁地吐了口唾沫。{/n}

languages.text: "Er behauptete, man würde die Enforcers unter Druck setzen, zum Vorteil ihrer gierigen Vorgesetzten die anderen Crewmitglieder unter Druck zu setzen. Er rief zu einem Umsturz auf, zu einer neuen Ordnung, zu der auch Vergeltung und Strafe für jeden zählen sollten, der an der verdorbenen Hierarchie des Schiffs beteiligt gewesen war." {n}Klein zieht seinen Respirator zur Seite und spuckt grimmig aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He claimed that the enforcers were being pressured into oppressing their fellow crewmen for the benefit of their greedy superiors. He called for a change of order, including reprisals and penance for anyone who had participated in the crimes of the ship's rotten hierarchy." {n}Klein pulls his respirator aside and spits morosely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Er behauptete, man würde die Enforcers unter Druck setzen, zum Vorteil ihrer gierigen Vorgesetzten die anderen Crewmitglieder unter Druck zu setzen. Er rief zu einem Umsturz auf, zu einer neuen Ordnung, zu der auch Vergeltung und Strafe für jeden zählen sollten, der an der verdorbenen Hierarchie des Schiffs beteiligt gewesen war." {n}Klein zieht seinen Respirator zur Seite und spuckt grimmig aus.{/n}

languages.text: « Il prétendait que les prévôts subissaient des pressions et se voyaient obligés d'opprimer les autres membres de l'équipage pour le seul bénéfice de leurs officiers supérieurs. Il appelait à un changement d'ordre, incluant des représailles et châtiments pour quiconque aurait participé aux crimes de la hiérarchie corrompue du vaisseau. » {n}Morose, Klein retire son respirateur le temps d'un crachat.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He claimed that the enforcers were being pressured into oppressing their fellow crewmen for the benefit of their greedy superiors. He called for a change of order, including reprisals and penance for anyone who had participated in the crimes of the ship's rotten hierarchy." {n}Klein pulls his respirator aside and spits morosely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Il prétendait que les prévôts subissaient des pressions et se voyaient obligés d'opprimer les autres membres de l'équipage pour le seul bénéfice de leurs officiers supérieurs. Il appelait à un changement d'ordre, incluant des représailles et châtiments pour quiconque aurait participé aux crimes de la hiérarchie corrompue du vaisseau. » {n}Morose, Klein retire son respirateur le temps d'un crachat.{/n}

languages.text: "İnfazcıların, açgözlü üstleri fayda görsün diye mürettebattaki akranlarına baskı yaptıklarını iddia etti. Düzenin değişmesi gerektiğini, geminin çürümüş hiyerarşisinde suç işleyenlerin karşılıklarını bulacağını söyledi." {n}Klein, maskesini kenara çekip huysuzca tükürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "He claimed that the enforcers were being pressured into oppressing their fellow crewmen for the benefit of their greedy superiors. He called for a change of order, including reprisals and penance for anyone who had participated in the crimes of the ship's rotten hierarchy." {n}Klein pulls his respirator aside and spits morosely.{/n}
